00049 #include "Pipeline.h"
00050 #include "Model.h"
00051 
00052 /**
00053  * This is a default implementation for the Execution_Strategy
00054  * interface for testing using a model.
00055  */
00056 class Testing_Execution_Strategy: public Execution_Strategy {
00057 public:
00058     Testing_Execution_Strategy(Pipeline&, Model&);
00059     virtual ~Testing_Execution_Strategy();
00060 
00061     //!Define what filters need to added and when
00062     //!Runs the assembled pipeline once
00063     void execute();
00064 
00065 private:
00066     Pipeline& _pipeline;
00067     Model& _model;
00068 };
